body: Roland Soong has translated a number of articles raising questions on the "Take chance photos to liberate child beggars" campaign: Stop Running And Think For A Moment by Qiu Ming, Who Is Being Abducted And Sold Off? by Hecaitou.

title: China: Raising questions on the "Liberate child beggars campaign"
